Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Clean up Kiwoom API related code and documentation

- Remove all Kiwoom API integration files and documentation
- Delete data collection scripts and mock data generators
- Clean up configuration files (.env)
- Keep web application intact
- Reset project to clean state for fresh start

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add real-time market news analysis feature

- Implement news collection from NewsAPI and Alpha Vantage
- Add AI-powered news impact analysis using Claude API
- Create importance rating system (1-5 stars)
- Identify affected stocks and sectors automatically
- Add beautiful news page with filtering and real-time updates
- Integrate news section into main navigation
- Update environment variables and dependencies

Features:
- Real-time news collection from multiple sources
- AI analysis of market impact and sentiment
- Star-based importance rating (5 stars = critical, 1 star = minor)
- Automatic stock/sector correlation
- Key points extraction
- Time sensitivity classification
- Beautiful responsive UI with gradients and animations

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(else echo "Models not saved yet, still training...")
Bash(else echo "models_FINAL folder not created yet")
Bash(then python -c "import json; data=json.load(open(''data/news_analysis.json'')); print(f''News items: {len(data)}''); print(f''Latest: {data[0][""news_title""] if data else ""No news""}'')")
Bash(for file in index.html market.html screener.html watchlist.html calendar.html about.html)
Bash(for file in index.html market.html screener.html watchlist.html news.html about.html)

Bash(do sed -i "s|<link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""{{ url_for(''static'', filename=''light-mode.css'') }}"">|<link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""{{ url_for(''static'', filename=''dark-mode.css'') }}"">\n    <link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""{{ url_for(''static'', filename=''light-mode.css'') }}"">|" "$file")
Bash(else echo "News data file NOT found")
